attributes.action: Allow skirts AND trousers in both all boy and all girl schools
attributes.additional_details: So people can feel right in their own body and be comfortable with how they dress, in public schools this is possible but I’ve noticed in all girls and all boy schools they only have the one uniform choice and I feel girls and boys and those between should be able to feel comfortable in their choice of clothing in all types of schools.
attributes.background: Make it a common part of school uniforms to have skirts and trousers for all genders
